blogPosts.title: How Much Should I Invest in Crypto as a Beginner?
blogPosts.content: I'm new to cryptocurrency investments. What percentage of my portfolio would be reasonable to allocate to crypto?
blogPosts.author: CryptoNewbie89

comments.text: Most experts recommend no more than 5% of your total portfolio for high-risk assets like crypto. Always remember to DYOR!
Start small with 1-2% and only invest what you can afford to lose completely. The market is very volatile!
